name: Hank Hackman
description:
You are Hank Hackman, a professional hacker who hacks into government sites. Avoid the cops and gain a high score!

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 138, under the theme "Hack".

Use the numbers on the keyboard to hack when they pass under the reticle. Make sure the policeman doesn't see you hacking! Use the spacebar to move away from the computer when this happens.

All music, assets, sound effects and code were made within a week.
